extendedInfo.description: IMPORTANT NOTE --> http://49ers.es/corbi/voicealerts/blogNOTE: This App uses the Text-to-speech library available for free in the Android Market, please download it if you don't have it already or if the app is not working in your phone. For other issues, please contact me per Email.Thanks.VoiceAlerts is an application for the android mobile platform, its goal is to alert the user with speech messages when the following events occur:Incoming/Missed Calls: Alerts the user when receives a call, speaking the name of the contact. Configure repeat mode for missed calls alert. Configure it to not speak while your are calling.Time changes: it can be configured to "speak" the current time in 15,30 and 60 minutes intervals.  For instance: "it is 20 hours 15 minutes" . 12H format configurable.Sms received: A voice alert informs the user that a new sms is received, it can be configured to read the content as well. And to translate the most common sms abbreviations (in the 5 supported languages) while reading the content for instance: c u l8r -> see you later.Battery alerts: The user can specify a battery level (for instance 5%), below that level the app alerts the user with a voice message about the current battery status. Also, when the battery is completely loaded or to alert of the progress when its being loaded. Fully configurable.Memory alerts: A voice alert informs the user when the memory level is too low. When the battery has been completely loaded...Message on Boot: You android welcomes you with a customized message.Application Installed/uninstalled: It will be informed when an application package is being installed or removed.Network availability: Your android informs you when the connection to the network is interrumpted ( in an elevator or tunnel) and re-established.Wifi connections: Informs you when your phone connects to a wifi network or an open one is found.TWIDROID integration, now your android phone will tell you the twitter messages the user you are following post and the replies or direct messages you received. You need to have Twidroid (both free and full version supported) installed on your phone.GMAIL integration: Voice Alerts reads the unread emails you receive on your gmail account. Extremely configurable, choose to read the attachments, the date, limit the number of characters being read per email.Night Mode: You can specify a time-range for Voice Alerts to be deactivated, this is particular usefull at night, so Voice Alerts does not wake you up.Shake to Stop: To stop an alert you can configure Voice Alerts to stop speaking if you shake your phone.Lots of configuration Possibilities: Yo can configure Voice Alerts to be de/activated when your smartphone is dis/connected to a Bluetooth Headset, this is particular usefull when you use Voice Alerts with the Bt device of your car.If you use Voice Alerts with a A2DP Bluetooth device, the alerts will only be spoken through your BT Device, this is perfect while being on a motorbike or to prevent your Alerts to be spoken out loud when other people are around you.Also, if you configure it, Voice Alerts will be deactivated if you unplug your headphones.Support for different languages (Spanish, English, German, Italian and French).Added Widget to Activate/Deactivate the App easily and quick.

reviews.title: doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I downloaded this app and put it on my droid. it never gave me 1 alert. receive new email it would never read it. maybe I\'m just not college educated enough. oh well if I can\'t make it work in the trash it goes.
reviews.author: Bill Bryant

reviews.title: Abandonware!
reviews.comment: Great for what it does but seemingly abandoned by its author... Over 6 months since even a generic tweet from him. Shame as it was the best voice alert app on Android. Enjoy it before it stops working on modern OS\'s.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could be great.
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t come out of \"sleep mode\" on Droid X2.  You have to reboot your phone to get out of it.  Exiting app doesn\'t help.  No response from DEV after email.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Voice alert is totally unreliable.
reviews.comment: DINC 1&2, TBOLT. DROID X1&X2. Finally found \"Voice Notify and Alarmdroid\" together does it all flawlessly and it\'s FREE :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Call alert won\'t stop
reviews.comment: Galaxy S 2...announces calls but won\'t stop even after the call. Shaking doesn\'t work to stop announcement of phone calls. Have to end program to get it to stop. I\'d otherwise love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pls try to integrate more voice alerts
reviews.comment: Awesome app that shouldn\'t be missed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Anouncement won\'t shut off
reviews.comment: Notifications repeat continually. Had to un install because it wasn\'t usable and embarrassing when people were around. Kept saying \"incoming call for 5 minutes and had to restart my phone for it to shut up. Would have been great if it worked
reviews.author: Paul Leach

reviews.title: Was good.. March 2011 no updates
reviews.comment: Works sometimes mostly force closes when option for missed calls is active and so many other little bugs that still have yet to be fixed by DEV. Not working any more and never really worked 100%. Also Dev does not update app or answer my questions ever! So time to uninstall and look for something better as there is better apps out now. If the Dev would fix the FC problem, also does not always load or alerts fail to go off. So after a year or so of no updates. Time to uninstall this app dev does not fix anyt
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Its use full features for buisness hours..
reviews.author: Kulvinder Singh

reviews.title: Good, but not great.
reviews.comment: Good options and includes mostly everything you could need, but... status notification won\'t \'stay\' off and doesn\'t work to great with Google\'s new inbuilt iCS speech. HTC HD2 with iCS CM9 and GB CM7
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Works fine with CM7 and Stock on my Incredible. Would be nice to see the alerts expanded to include other emails (besides gmail), Facebook, etc., and the alert to autocancel when you pick up a call (\"so and so is calling you 5x after I\'ve picked up isn\'t nice). Definitely happy with my purchase. Hopefully Alex adds more features soon.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I would have paid for this app im running adam tts voice to speech. Not robotic like most tts so this app makes everything very clear and stated. Now my notifications tell me i have unread emails from named senders. Txt is great to. Phone calls a dream before i reach for the phone now i wait a sec to hear the caller. Fantastic
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App has issues
reviews.comment: It does not announce completely and cuts out, but the worst is that it does not stop announcing voice calls long after you cancel the call and the phone stops ringing. Uninstalled. Galaxy Note II
reviews.author: Wade Chestnut

reviews.title: very nice...only one request for improvement
reviews.comment: Instead of using an app-specific volume setting, utilize the system notification level so that it is consistent.  That way when I am listening to music the default of 100 doesn\'t make it blow my ears out, or if I throttle it down to 50, make it unhearable in other applications.  Other than that, love the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Installation OK Setup\\Config broke my <3 days rule. Could not get audio anounce of incoming email or texti. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Voice alerts
reviews.comment: Took me forever to find this app after accidently setting my phone to speak then having to reset it cause of phone pro  have been using this app is it me or dos it miss the first letter of every name it says is texting very annoying either do it\' properly or dont?
reviews.author: Sarah Arthur-Booker

reviews.title: Voice alert
reviews.comment: The app works fine, just wish I could change the voice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Problems
reviews.comment: I haven\'t heard this program work yet after installing tts. Plus night mode is on in the middle of day and won\'t go off even after disabling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Close but no cigar
reviews.comment: 1: doesn\'t pause or lower media volume to read texts 2: turns itself on every time i take the phone out of vibrate. Please fix these things.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good!! But seems to fc alot ...and comes on at odd times!
reviews.comment: And comes on at odd times! (Perhaps its my phone (SAMStrato)
reviews.author: A Google User
